arts.ttl: Northern Ireland XI vs Luxembourg – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Luxembourg and Northern Ireland kick off their 2026 FIFA World Cup European Qualifying campaigns on Thursday at Stade de Luxembourg, with both sides aiming to start Group A on a winning note. Hosts Luxembourg, under new coach Jeff Strasser, seek to build on recent improvements, while Michael O’Neill’s Northern Ireland aim to continue their competitive […] The post Northern Ireland XI vs Luxembourg – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
